about_the_game:
A brick breaking game with a spooky Halloween twists, tricks, and treats!

Including 5 different themed worlds with 4 levels per world and a pseudo boss-fight type styled level at the end of each world! Defeat mummies, witches, creepy clowns and more!

Unlock different balls, paddles, and more as you play while on a quest for a high score!
detailed_description:
A brick breaking game with a spooky Halloween twists, tricks, and treats!

Including 5 different themed worlds with 4 levels per world and a pseudo boss-fight type styled level at the end of each world! Defeat mummies, witches, creepy clowns and more!

Unlock different balls, paddles, and more as you play while on a quest for a high score!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04.1 LTS 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 512MB RAM and Webgl enabled
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04.1 LTS 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 4096MB RAM and Webgl enabled

name: Spooky Bricks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 512MB RAM and Webgl enabled
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 4096MB RAM and Webgl enabled
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Break them bricks but beware of spooky creatures and critters!
